title: 'Produce 101's Hwang In Sun is a tough girl on a motorcycle for 3rd single 'Hwang Ya' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me 'Produce 101's Hwang In Sun is a tough girl on a motorcycle for 3rd single 'Hwang Ya' By yckim124 12 minutes ago 1,126 93 0 0 Google+ Hwang In Sun is getting ready to make a comeback with her third single!
On February 28, Show Works officially announced, "Hwang In Sun is releasing her 3rd single ' Hwang Ya ' on March 3 and will start promoting as a singer." 
She participated in ' Produce 101 ' and gained the nickname 'Auntie Hwang', and after the show, she's making a comeback after 10 months. For ''Hwang Ya", the singer has turned into a tough girl, radiating fierce charisma on a motorcycle. 
Stay tuned for the full release coming next month! YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
